attributes.action: Put Jeremy Beadle on the £5 note
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From 1990 he wrote and presented You've Been Framed!, a family show featuring humorous clips from viewers' home video recordings. 
Beadle has Poland syndrome and is noted for being one of the first TV presenters with a visible disability. His disability manifests as a disproportionately sized right hand.
The Wallaces' book The Intimate Sex Lives of the Famous (Hutchinson, 1981) was researched in part in Beadle's library, which contains an extensive canon of erotic literature.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
